name: firebase
notes: firebase is the client SDK for browsers/React Native. Designed for browser environments with IndexedDB, localStorage, WebSocket, and browser-specific APIs. Not suitable for Workers serverless environment. Use firebase-admin SDK for server-side Firebase operations, or use direct REST API calls to Firebase services (Auth REST API, Firestore REST API, etc.).
alternative: firebase-admin (for server-side operations) or direct Firebase REST API
